content: the easy ribbed hat knitting pattern is the perfect baby hat knitting pattern it s super easy to knit and the pretty rib stitch provides great texture and makes a stretchy warm hat the folded brim makes this cute little baby hat even warmer this ribbed hat makes a great baby shower gift for your favorite newborn baby or toddler this pattern is available to view for free in one size only no download at littleredwindow com/knitting-patterns or you can purchase it right here in a super easy to print pdf with instructions for all 4 sizes sizing and info -this pdf pattern contains instructions for approximate sizes 0-3 months 6 months 1-2 years 3-6 years child large/adult small adult large update this pattern was updated in february 2024 to add additional sizing for more information on changes and to answer questions including how to get an updated pattern visit ttps //bit ly/lrwsizing
